rows.label: bf07080100_0010
rows.name:
After making her say she'd be better off dead,
don't you feel anything at all?

rows.label: bf07080100_0022
rows.name: planning to sacrifice herself to defeat them!

rows.label: bf07080100_0040
rows.name: After driving her to that point, you still...

rows.label: bf07080100_0050
rows.name:
Was your desire to go to Eden with her
really that shallow?

rows.label: bf07080100_0060
rows.name:
It's been a while.
Dad[ML:Dash ] Mom[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf07080100_0070
rows.name:
I became a Driver!
Amazing, right?

rows.label: bf07080100_0100
rows.name: A very important person to me.

rows.label: bf07080100_0110
rows.name:
I've decided to go to Eden
together with Homura.

rows.label: bf07080100_0120
rows.name: I don't know what will happen from now on,

rows.label: bf07080100_0130
rows.name: but please watch over Homura and me.
